title: Four Seasons Hotel Amman Invites Guests to "Stay Longer" with a Complimentary 4th Night in Luxurious AccommodationsTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Four Seasons Hotel Amman Invites Guests to “Stay Longer” with a Complimentary 4th Night in Luxurious Accommodations Published on : Tuesday, August 18, 2015
Plan a few days’ holiday with Four Seasons Hotel Amman. Explore the charming city of Amman, enjoy the tranquility of The Spa, and indulge in the diverse food and beverage outlets at the luxury property. Guests are invited to book a three night stay with and in return receive a complimentary fourth night in one of the Hotel’s luxurious and spacious Premium Rooms.
To cater to travelling enthusiasts, Four Seasons Hotel Amman is offering its latest package, Stay Longer- Fourth Night Free, to allow guests to enjoy an additional night in signature Four Seasons comfort. Use that extra day to indulge in one of The Spa’s local treatments, or to dine at the Hotel’s local restaurant Olea to experience home-style Levant cuisine.
For guests who want to explore the city, use the extra day to discover other hidden gems, such as Beit Sitti – the not-to-be-missed local culinary experience in Amman, where one can learn how to prepare a homemade Arabic meal and then enjoy their cooking in an authentic local atmosphere. Outdoorsy guests can head off on an adventurous “water hike” on the Wadi Mujib Siq Trail.
This offer is valid until the end of the year. To book a stay at Four Seasons Hotel Amman and tap into the local destination insights of the Hotel’s Concierge team, visit the Hotel’s website.
